tool_description: The API provides you a way to consume different API's around product, customer and account.
name: Direct Wines
title: Direct Wines

api_list.name: Profile
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://directwines.p.rapidapi.com/api/user/details"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "directwines.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
